discourse_list.title: Forward looking proposal to reward integrators / referrals / innovators

content.content: Instead of discussing the Retroactive Airdrop extension, i will make a new, forward looking proposal. I think that integrators and innovators should be rewarded. Proposal Have the top 3 integrators rewarded, that create a lot of volume on uniswap pools Have the top 3 referrals rewared, that generate new users on uniswap Have the top 3 innovators rewarded, that generate working prototypes / bridges to other protocols / bug fixes. The first two can be decided after some metric, automated calculations. The last one can be decided by community voting. Do this every Quarter of a Year. Dont give too big incentives, but big enough that innovators etc. are happily rewarded. This is a incentive mix, to step into the future and have the community and the protocol flourish.
content.GPT-summary: The author proposes a new reward system for integrators, referrals, and innovators in the Uniswap community. The proposal suggests rewarding the top 3 integrators, referrals, and innovators every quarter of a year. The author suggests that the first two categories can be decided based on automated calculations, while the last category can be decided by community voting. The proposal aims to incentivize community members to contribute to the growth and development of the Uniswap protocol.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
